top_stories.title: Silicon Valley’s messiest breakup is definitely headed to court
top_stories.description: OpenAI and Microsoft tried to dodge a courtroom showdown with Elon Musk, but a federal judge on Thursday rejected their requests to dismiss the case.
top_stories.author: Connie Loizos
top_stories.content: OpenAI and Microsoft tried to dodge a courtroom showdown with Elon Musk, but a federal judge on Thursday rejected their requests to dismiss the case.

top_stories.title: CloudKeeper Leads G2 Winter 2026 Report for Cloud Cost Management Worldwide
top_stories.description: With a back-to-back 100% customer satisfaction score, CloudKeeper has outperformed 60+ platforms CloudKeeper, a leading cloud cost optimization company, has been recognized as the #1 globally ranked solution in G2’s Winter 2026 Grid Report for Cloud Cost Management, outperforming 60+ competitive platforms in the category. This marks its 12th recognition... The post CloudKeeper Leads G2 Winter 2026 Report for Cloud Cost Management Worldwide first appeared on AI-Tech Park.
top_stories.author: PR Newswire
top_stories.content: With a back-to-back 100% customer satisfaction score, CloudKeeper has outperformed 60+ platforms CloudKeeper, a leading cloud cost optimization company, has been recognized as the #1 globally ranked solution in G2’s Winter 2026 Grid Report for Cloud Cost Management, outperforming 60+ competitive platforms in the category. This marks its 12th recognition... The post CloudKeeper Leads G2 Winter 2026 Report for Cloud Cost Management Worldwide first appeared on AI-Tech Park.

top_stories.title: Sentiment Analysis with Text and Audio Using AWS Generative AI Services: Approaches, Challenges, and Solutions
top_stories.description: This post, developed through a strategic scientific partnership between AWS and the Instituto de Ciência e Tecnologia Itaú (ICTi), P&D hub maintained by Itaú Unibanco, the largest private bank in Latin America, explores the technical aspects of sentiment analysis for both text and audio. We present experiments comparing multiple machine learning (ML) models and services, discuss the trade-offs and pitfalls of each approach, and highlight how AWS services can be orchestrated to build robust,...
top_stories.author: Caique de Almeida, Guilherme Rinaldo, Paulo Finardi, Victor Costa Beraldo, Vinicius Caridá
top_stories.content: This post, developed through a strategic scientific partnership between AWS and the Instituto de Ciência e Tecnologia Itaú (ICTi), P&D hub maintained by Itaú Unibanco, the largest private bank in Latin America, explores the technical aspects of sentiment analysis for both text and audio. top_stories.title: AI’s Next Revolution: Multiply Labs Is Scaling Robotics-Driven Cell Therapy Biomanufacturing Labs
top_stories.description: Startup works with leading cell therapy companies to bring robotics manufacturing into the clean room, reducing costs by more than 70% while accelerating output compared with legacy systems.
top_stories.author: Scott Martin
top_stories.content: Startup works with leading cell therapy companies to bring robotics manufacturing into the clean room, reducing costs by more than 70% while accelerating output compared with legacy systems.

top_stories.title: NVIDIA Rubin Platform, Open Models, Autonomous Driving: NVIDIA Presents Blueprint for the Future at CES
